Title: Relates to expanding the definition of agency
Summary: Relates to expanding the definition of agency; includes entities created by an agency or that are governed by a board of directors or similar body a majority of which is designated by one or more state or local government officials in the definition of agency under the public officers law.
LawCode: Amd ยง86, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to expanding the definition of agency
